description.en:
Part I - Molecular and cellular bioengineering.
Genetic engineering. Direct manipulation of organism's genes. Recombinant DNA technology; genetic modification/manipulation; genetic screening.
Cellular bioengineering. Stem cells. Tissue engineering and biomaterials. Artificial organs and biological materials. Cancer bioengineering. Biomarker discovery and targeted therapy. In vivo cancer modeling. Drug delivery. Nanomedicine. Nanoparticles for drug delivery. Protein engineering, expression and purification. Bioprocess engineering. Bioprocess design. Manufacturing of proteins and biomolecules.
Molecular bioengineering. DNA-protein/RNA-protein interactions, protein folding and function etc. that function as therapeutics.
Part II - Medical devices. Biomechanics. Medical devices and biomedical diagnostics. Biomedical and molecular imaging.
description.et:
I osa - molekulaarne ja rakuline biomeditsiinitehnoloogia. Geenitehnoloogia, organismi geenide otsene manipuleerimine. Rekombinantse DNA tehnoloogia; geneetiline skriinimine. Tüvirakud. Eluskudede tehnoloogiad ja biomaterjalid. Kunstlikud organid. Vähkasvajatega seotud biomeditsiini tehnoloogiad. Biomarkerite otsimine ja suunatud teraapia. In vivo vähi modelleerimine. Nanomeditsiin. Nanoosakesed ravimite kandjatena. Molekulaarsed visualiseerimise meetodid. Valkude inseneeria, ekspressioon ja puhastamine. Biotöötlus. Biomolekulide ja valkude tootmine. 
DNA-valk, RNA-valk interaktsioonid, valkude pakkumine ja funktsioneerimine terapeutikumidena.
II osa -  Meditsiinitehnilised aparaadid. Biomehhaanika. Biomeditsiini diagnostika.

objectives.en: This course will give an overview about the techniques, skills and modern tools used in the field of biomedical engineering and provide students the opportunity to learn from recent advances.
objectives.et: Kursus annab ülevaate tehnoloogiatest, oskustest ja moodsatest meetoditest, mida kasutatakse biomeditsiinitehnoloogias, et avada üliõpilastele võimalus õppida selle ala uutest arengutest.

learning_outcomes.en: Biomedical engineering is the application of engineering principles and design concepts to medicine and biology for healthcare purposes, like diagnostics or therapeutics. Biomedical engineering is advancing rapidly and produces important innovations that improve our quality of life.
learning_outcomes.et: Biomeditsiini tehnoloogia on distsipliin, mis rakendab inseneeria printsiipe ja disainikontseptsioone meditsiinis ja bioloogias eesmärgiga edendada tervishoidu läbi parema diagnostika ja teraapia. Biomeditsiini tehnoloogia areneb kiiresti ja uued innovaatilised lahendused parandavad meie elukvaliteeti.
